contents: Article 4 (Business) ① Member sports organizations carry out the following projects and activities to achieve the purpose of Article 2. Revised 2021. 10. 6., 2022. 12. 26. 1. Deliberation and decision on the basic policy for the relevant event 2. Advice and suggestions regarding competitions for the relevant event 3. Hosting and participation in international competitions for the relevant event 4. Guidance and support from city/provincial sports organizations and national federations of the relevant sport 5. Hosting and supervision of competitions of the relevant sport 6. Research and improvement of playing techniques of the relevant sport 7. Players, coaches, referees, and operating personnel of the relevant sport Training 8. Development and improvement of competition facilities and equipment for the relevant sport and public figures related thereto 9. Support for the development of hobbyist organizations and sports clubs for the relevant sport 10. Development and distribution of daily sports programs for the relevant sport 11. Business performance of the relevant sport organization Profitable business to raise necessary financial resources 12. Other projects necessary to promote the relevant sport and achieve the goals of the sport organization ② Member sport organizations may approve the dissemination of events and the hosting of competitions within the scope of their jurisdiction at the request of city/provincial sport organizations. . However, national-scale projects must be hosted by member sports organizations. ③ In relation to the recognition under Paragraph 1, Item 8, member sports organizations must not create new recognition requirements that are outside of the international recognition regulations or force the use of products from specific companies, and may not charge more certification fees than necessary. Revised 2021. 10. 6. ④ Matters necessary for the operation of the recognition system, such as recognition requirements for each event, recognition fees, and recognition deadlines, are separately determined by the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as *Sports Council). ⑤ Member sports organizations shall determine the matters necessary for recognition of each event within the scope of the regulations established by the Sports Council pursuant to paragraph 4 and report them to the Sports Council. Revised 2021. 10. 6.
